vote.title: Authorize an eighteen-month service contract to develop an update to the forwardDallas! Comprehensive Land Use Plan for the Department of Planning and Urban Design - Houseal Lavigne Associates, LLC, most advantageous proposer of fourteen - Not to exceed $649,960 - Financing:  Building Inspection Fund ($415,960) and Capital Projects Reimbursement Fund ($234,000) (This item was deferred on September 23, 2020 and January 27, 2021)
